pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download and Process GIMMS NDVI3g Data // We provide a set of functions to retrieve information about GIMMS NDVI3g files currently available online; download and re-arrange the bi- monthly datasets according to creation time; import downloaded files from native binary (ENVI) format directly into R based on the widely applied 'raster' package; and calculate monthly value composites (e.g. maximum value composites, MVC) from the bi-monthly input data.
